org.openimaj.util.function.predicates

Class Or<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.function.predicates.Or<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the input type of the predicates
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Predicate<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinEpsilonOrMaxIterations

    public class Or<T>
extends Object
implements Predicate<T>
    "Or" together 2 or more predicates
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
